mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1, INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)-(INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,3)+1)) CATEGORY FROM SVIEW where companyCode = #{companyCode} ORDER BY CATEGORY

select * from (SELECT sum(salesAmount) salesAmount, payType, SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1, INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)-(INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1)) LCATEGORY, salesType FROM SVIEW where day like #{date} || '%' and companyCode = #{companyCode} group by SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1, INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)-(INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1)), payType, salesType) where payType = #{payType} and lCategory = #{lCategory} order by salesType

select * from (SELECT sum(salesAmount) salesAmount, SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1, INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)-(INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1)) LCATEGORY, SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)+1) MCATEGORY, salesType FROM SVIEW where day like #{date} || '%' and companyCode = #{companyCode} group by SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1, INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)-(INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1)), SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)+1), salesType) where lCategory = #{lCategory} and mCategory = #{mCategory} order by salesType

select * from (SELECT sum(salesAmount) salesAmount, SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1, INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)-(INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1)) LCATEGORY, salesType FROM SVIEW where day like #{date} || '%' and companyCode = #{companyCode} group by SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1, INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)-(INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1)), salesType) where lCategory = #{lCategory} order by salesType

select * from (SELECT sum(salesAmount) salesAmount, payType, salesType FROM SVIEW where day like #{date} || '%' and companyCode = #{companyCode} group by payType, salesType) where payType = #{payType} order by payType, salesType

select * from (SELECT sum(salesAmount) salesAmount, SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1, INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)-(INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1)) LCATEGORY, salesType FROM SVIEW where day like #{date} || '%' and companyCode = #{companyCode} group by salesType, SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1, INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)-(INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1))) where lCategory = #{lCategory} order by salesType
SELECT sum(salesAmount) salesAmount FROM SALESVIEW where day like #{date} || '%' and companyCode = #{companyCode}
SELECT sum(salesAmount) refundAmount FROM refundVIEW where day like #{date} || '%' and companyCode = #{companyCode}
select year from (select substr(day, 1, 2) year from salesView where companyCode = #{companyCode} order by day) group by year
select month from (select substr(day, 1, 2) year, substr(day, 4, 2) month from salesView where day like #{year} || '%' and companyCode = #{companyCode} order by day) group by month order by month
select substr(day, 1, 2) year from salesView where companyCode = #{companyCode} group by substr(day, 1, 2) order by substr(day, 1, 2)
select substr(day, 4, 2) month from salesView where companyCode = #{companyCode} and day like #{year} || '%' group by substr(day, 4, 2) order by substr(day, 4, 2)
mapper.insert: insert into sales(sno, sales_companycode, sales_day, sales_categorycode, paytype, salesamount, salescount, salestype) values(sales_seq.nextval, #{companyCode},#{day}, #{categoryCode},#{payType},#{SalesAmount, jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{salesCount},#{SalesType})
mapper.delete: delete from sales where sale_day=#{sales_day} and paytype=#{paytype}
